name: BUDDYAI
description: An easy to install bot for Discord - DM to contact mods!

AUDIOCHANNEL_ID.description: The id of audio channel bot can talk to.

Channels_Valid.description: A list of comma-separated text-channels used for the bot to interact. ('general' recommended)

TIMEZONE.description: Your Timezone for python pytz package.

GUILD_ID.description: The id for the server you are hosting this bot for.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A github personal access token with the repo scope.
